description: Provides an Isolation Group resource. The Isolation Group is a logical group of UHost instance, which ensure that each UHost instance within a group is on a different physical machine. Up to seven UHost instance can be added per isolation group in a single availability_zone.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description: The name of the isolation group information which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', '.', ',', '[', ']', ':'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with `tf-isolation-group`.

Remark.description: The remarks of the isolation group. (Default: `""`).
